title: Phase 11: Scale, Optimization & Market Domination
description: Scale DWCP v3 production operations to enterprise hyper-growth, prepare DWCP v4 for general availability, integrate quantum & neuromorphic breakthrough technologies, establish unassailable competitive moat, and build continuous innovation engine for sustained market leadership. Target: 99% neural accuracy, 6 specialized agents, enterprise dominance.
design:
Phase 11 represents the scaling, optimization, and market domination phase:

1. **Production Operations Excellence at Scale** - Optimize running systems for 10,000+ enterprise customers
2. **DWCP v4 General Availability** - Move from alpha to GA with 1,000,000+ users
3. **Enterprise Hyper-Growth & Scale** - Scale to Fortune 500 adoption, $100M ARR
4. **Quantum & Neuromorphic Integration** - Implement breakthrough quantum optimization and neuromorphic acceleration
5. **Market Leadership & Competitive Moat** - Establish unassailable market position with 60%+ market share
6. **Continuous Innovation & Ecosystem Growth** - Build self-sustaining innovation engine with 10,000+ developers

Success criteria:
- 99% neural accuracy maintained
- Production operations: 10,000+ enterprise customers, 99.999% availability
- DWCP v4 GA: 1,000,000+ users with 100x performance improvements
- Quantum integration: 1000x speedup for optimization problems
- Market share: 60%+ dominance with unassailable moat
- Innovation velocity: 100+ features/year, 1,000+ community contributions
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Production operations: 10,000+ enterprise customers, 99.999% availability (five 9s)
- [ ] DWCP v4 GA: 1,000,000+ users, 100x performance validated
- [ ] Quantum integration: 1000x speedup for NP-hard optimization problems
- [ ] Neuromorphic acceleration: 10,000x energy efficiency for ML inference
- [ ] Market share: 60%+ with deep competitive moat
- [ ] Developer ecosystem: 10,000+ certified developers, 100,000+ community members
- [ ] Innovation velocity: 100+ features/year, 10+ breakthrough patents/year
- [ ] Quality: 98%+ production quality score
- [ ] Revenue: $100M+ ARR with 40%+ profit margins

title: Run Phase 0 benchmarks and Go/No-Go decision
description: Execute performance benchmarks to validate AMST bandwidth utilization, HDE compression ratio, migration time reduction, and CPU overhead. Make Go/No-Go decision for Phase 1.
design: Run go test -bench=. for bandwidth, compression, migration time, CPU overhead. Document results. Criteria: bandwidth >70%, compression >5x, no breaking changes, CPU <30%.
acceptance_criteria: All benchmark targets met, results documented in docs/DWCP-PHASE0-RESULTS.md, Go/No-Go decision made and documented
notes: Hierarchical swarm initialized. Research worker assigned to benchmark analysis. Expected completion: 2-3 hours.

title: Create DWCP package structure
description: Create backend/core/network/dwcp/ directory structure with transport/, compression/, prediction/, sync/, partition/, consensus/ subdirectories and initial files.
design: mkdir -p backend/core/network/dwcp/{transport,compression,prediction,sync,partition,consensus}. Create initial files: dwcp_manager.go, config.go, types.go
acceptance_criteria: Directory structure created, initial files present with package declarations

title: Phase 13: DWCP v5 GA, $1B ARR & Industry Dominance
description: Execute DWCP v5 General Availability production deployment, achieve $1B ARR milestone, secure 50%+ market share for industry dominance, commercialize advanced research breakthroughs (biological computing, quantum networking, AGI), prepare for IPO and public markets, and drive industry transformation through ecosystem leadership. Target: 99% neural accuracy, 6 specialized agents, complete market leadership consolidation.
design:
Phase 13 represents the industry dominance and public market preparation phase:

1. **DWCP v5 GA & Production Excellence** - Launch v5 to 1M+ users, microsecond startup at scale
2. **$1B ARR Achievement & Revenue Acceleration** - Hit $1B ARR milestone, 833% growth from Phase 11
3. **50%+ Market Share & Industry Dominance** - Secure majority market share, 350+ Fortune 500
4. **Advanced Research Commercialization** - Pilot deployments of biological, quantum, AGI technologies
5. **IPO Preparation & Public Markets** - S-1 filing, roadshow, public market readiness
6. **Industry Transformation & Ecosystem Leadership** - 20,000+ developers, 2,000+ apps, standards leadership

Success criteria:
- 99% neural accuracy maintained
- DWCP v5 GA: 1M+ users, 8.3Œºs cold start, planet-scale (100+ regions)
- Revenue: $1B ARR achieved (from $800M Phase 12)
- Market share: 50%+ achieved (from 48% Phase 12), 350+ Fortune 500
- Advanced research: Pilot deployments live (biological, quantum, AGI)
- IPO: S-1 filed, valuation $15B+, public market ready
- Ecosystem: 20,000+ developers, 2,000+ apps, industry standards
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] DWCP v5 GA: 1M+ concurrent users, 8.3Œºs cold start production-validated
- [ ] Revenue: $1B ARR milestone achieved (25% growth from $800M Phase 12)
- [ ] Market share: 50%+ achieved, 350+ Fortune 500 customers
- [ ] Advanced research: Pilot deployments (biological computing, quantum networking, AGI)
- [ ] IPO readiness: S-1 filed, $15B+ valuation, public market ready
- [ ] Ecosystem: 20,000+ certified developers, 2,000+ marketplace apps
- [ ] Quality: 99%+ production quality score
- [ ] Strategic position: Undisputed industry leader, standards body participation

title: Phase 2: Intelligence - PBA + ITP
description: ML-driven bandwidth prediction (PBA with LSTM) and intelligent task partitioning (ITP with Deep RL) implementation.
design: Implement PBA with LSTM models for bandwidth prediction, implement ITP with Deep RL for task partitioning, integrate with ai_engine/, add performance benchmarks.
acceptance_criteria: PBA prediction accuracy ‚â•85%, ITP improves distributed workload speed by ‚â•2x, AI models deployed and operational.
notes: Assigned to coder worker for PBA+ITP ML/AI implementation. Phase 2 foundation complete (~25K lines). Worker will enhance with advanced LSTM and Deep RL.

title: Phase 3: Synchronization - ASS + ACP
description: Multi-region state synchronization (ASS) and adaptive consensus (ACP) for distributed coordination.
design: Implement ASS for async state synchronization with eventual consistency, enhance ACP with adaptive consensus (Raft/Gossip/Byzantine), deploy multi-region test environment.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-region deployment successful, state staleness <5s, consensus adapts to network conditions, consistency validation passing.
notes: Assigned to analyst worker for ASS+ACP synchronization analysis. Phase 2 complete with 29/29 tests passing. Worker will design multi-region deployment.

title: Set up production deployment pipeline
description: Create CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment. Frontend is production-ready. Docker Compose configuration exists at docker-compose.production.yml
notes:
Deployment infrastructure review completed. Deliverables:
1. CI/CD Pipeline Design (docs/deployment/CI-CD-PIPELINE-DESIGN.md)
   - 6-stage pipeline with blue-green deployment
   - Security scanning, testing, container builds
   - Automated rollback and disaster recovery
2. Deployment Runbook (docs/deployment/DEPLOYMENT-RUNBOOK.md)
   - Step-by-step deployment procedures
   - Emergency rollback procedures
   - Incident response playbook
3. Infrastructure-as-Code (docs/deployment/INFRASTRUCTURE-AS-CODE.md)
   - Terraform configurations
   - Kubernetes manifests
   - Complete IaC templates
4. Monitoring & Alerting (docs/deployment/MONITORING-ALERTING.md)
   - Prometheus/Grafana setup
   - Alert rules (critical, warning, info)
   - DWCP-specific monitoring

Ready for implementation.

title: Phase 5: Production Validation
description: End-to-end testing, load testing, chaos engineering, security audit, and production deployment validation.
design: E2E tests (VM migration, workload distribution, multi-region), load tests (1000 concurrent operations), chaos tests (network partition, node failure), security audit, canary deployment.
acceptance_criteria: All E2E tests passing, load tests meet SLA targets, chaos tests demonstrate resilience, security audit passed, production deployment successful with rollback plan validated.
notes: Assigned to architect worker for Phase 5 production validation strategy. Worker will design E2E tests, load tests, and chaos engineering scenarios.

title: DWCP Integration into NovaCron
description: Implement Distributed WAN Communication Protocol across 5 phases to enable internet-scale distributed supercomputing. Expected outcomes: 92% WAN bandwidth utilization, 28x compression ratio, 3.3x faster VM migration, 2-3x distributed workload speed.
design: Integration follows 5-phase roadmap: Phase 0 (PoC - 2 weeks), Phase 1 (Foundation - 4 weeks), Phase 2 (Intelligence - 4 weeks), Phase 3 (Synchronization - 4 weeks), Phase 4 (Optimization - 4 weeks), Phase 5 (Production Validation - 6 weeks). Total timeline: 22 weeks.
acceptance_criteria: All 5 phases completed with validation criteria met: WAN bandwidth ‚â•85%, compression ‚â•10x, migration speedup ‚â•2x, backward compatibility maintained, multi-region deployment successful.

title: Phase 8: Operational Excellence & Enterprise Readiness
description: Advanced operations, global federation, developer ecosystem, business intelligence, compliance frameworks, and community tools. 99% neural accuracy with alignment to phases 1-7.
design: Phase 8 builds on the complete DWCP v3 stack (phases 1-7: ~175K lines, 41 agents) to deliver enterprise-grade operational excellence. Six specialized agents with 99% neural accuracy will implement: (1) SRE automation with chaos engineering at scale, (2) Global multi-region federation with intelligent routing, (3) Complete developer ecosystem with SDKs/CLI/marketplace, (4) Advanced BI/analytics with predictive cost optimization, (5) Compliance automation for SOC2/GDPR/HIPAA, (6) Community tools and comprehensive documentation.
acceptance_criteria: All 6 agents complete deliverables. SRE automation operational with <5min MTTR. Global federation deployed across 5+ regions. Developer ecosystem with 3+ SDKs and CLI tools. BI platform with real-time analytics. Compliance frameworks certified. Community documentation complete (10,000+ lines).

title: Fix backend duplicate type declarations
description:
Multiple types are declared in multiple files causing compilation errors. Need to consolidate:
- NodeState in consensus/raft.go and consensus/membership.go
- NetworkMetrics in network/performance_predictor.go and network/network_manager.go  
- User, AuditLogger, AuditEvent, Role, Permission in security package

title: Create Phase 0 integration tests
description: Create comprehensive integration test suite covering AMST bandwidth utilization, HDE compression ratio, end-to-end VM migration, and backward compatibility.
design: Create integration_test.go with tests for: multi-stream vs single TCP, delta encoding vs full state, E2E migration with DWCP, backward compatibility. Use testify/assert for assertions.
acceptance_criteria: All integration tests passing, test coverage >80%, backward compatibility confirmed

title: Clean up unused imports and variables
description: Remove unused imports like database/sql in pkg/database/optimized_database.go and fix declared but unused variables

title: Phase 1: DWCP Production Foundation
description: Implement production-ready AMST and HDE with full integration into NovaCron. Deploy monitoring, testing, and staging environment. Use neural-trained hive-mind swarm for coordinated implementation.
design: Neural-aware hive-mind architecture with queen coordinator, specialized worker agents, and cross-agent memory synchronization. Train patterns from Phase 0, deploy production components, integrate with existing services.
acceptance_criteria: Production AMST and HDE deployed, bandwidth utilization >85%, compression ratio >10x, monitoring functional, staging tests passing

title: Phase 0: DWCP Proof-of-Concept
description: Validate DWCP integration with AMST + HDE prototype. Goals: Prove multi-stream TCP works with existing migration service, demonstrate delta encoding reduces bandwidth, confirm no breaking changes.
design: Create DWCP package structure, implement AMST prototype (multi-stream TCP with 16-256 streams), implement HDE prototype (delta encoding + Zstandard compression), integrate with migration service, run benchmarks.
acceptance_criteria: Bandwidth utilization >70%, compression ratio >5x, integration tests passing, benchmark results documented, Go/No-Go decision made.

title: Implement AMST prototype
description: Implement Adaptive Multi-Stream Transport with 16-256 concurrent TCP streams, dynamic stream allocation, and per-stream congestion control.
design: Create transport/multi_stream_tcp.go with MultiStreamTCP struct, NewMultiStreamTCP(), Send(), Receive() methods. Implement stream_manager.go for lifecycle management and packet_pacer.go for software pacing.
acceptance_criteria: AMST achieves >70% bandwidth utilization in benchmarks, supports 16-256 streams, integrates with net.Conn interface

title: Phase 12: Hyper-Scale, DWCP v5 & Global Domination
description: Execute hyper-scale operations (100,000+ customers, 10M+ VMs), launch DWCP v5 research and alpha, execute market domination strategy (60%+ share), establish advanced research lab for breakthrough technologies, mature ecosystem to 10,000+ developers, and execute strategic M&A for accelerated growth. design:

1. **Hyper-Scale Operations Excellence** - Scale to 100,000+ customers, 10M+ concurrent VMs
2. **DWCP v5 Research & Alpha Launch** - Next-generation architecture (1000x startup, planet-scale coordination)
3. **Market Domination Execution** - Execute 60%+ market share strategy, $1B ARR by 2026

5. **Ecosystem Maturity & Growth** - Achieve 10,000+ certified developers, 1,000+ apps
6. **Strategic M&A & Partnerships** - Accelerate through acquisitions and strategic alliances

- 99% neural accuracy maintained
- Hyper-scale: 100,000+ customers, 10M+ VMs, 99.9999% availability (six 9s)
- DWCP v5 alpha: 1000x startup (8.3Œºs cold start), planet-scale (100+ regions)
- Market share: 50%+ achieved (en route to 60%), $1B ARR milestone

- Ecosystem: 10,000+ certified developers, 1,000+ marketplace apps
- M&A: 5+ strategic acquisitions completed

title: finish frontend development on all features and pages
Implement HDE prototype
description: Implement Hierarchical Delta Encoding with baseline state management, delta encoding for VM memory pages, and Zstandard compression.

acceptance_criteria: HDE achieves >5x compression ratio in benchmarks, successfully encodes/decodes VM memory pages, adaptive compression working

description: Advanced automation, ecosystem partnerships, MLOps platform, market readiness, research innovation, and comprehensive quality assurance. 99% neural accuracy completing the DWCP v1 ‚Üí v3 transformation.

MLOps platform deployed with full lifecycle support. GTM strategy complete with sales materials. Research lab producing innovations. QA validates entire stack with 95%+ score.

title: Phase 4: Production Optimization
description: Performance tuning, security hardening, deployment automation, and comprehensive monitoring for production readiness.

acceptance_criteria: Performance targets met (CPU <70%, memory <80%, network optimized), security audit passed, automated deployment working, monitoring operational.
notes: Assigned to tester worker for Phase 4 optimization validation. Worker will create performance test suite, security audit checklist, and monitoring plan.

design:

1. **Production Deployment Orchestration** - Execute 12-month phased rollout (canary ‚Üí gradual ‚Üí full ‚Üí global)

4. **Advanced AI/ML Intelligence** - Next-gen predictive capabilities, autonomous optimization
5. **Developer Community & Certification** - Certification programs, community events, ambassador network
6. **Future Architecture & Innovation** - 10-year technology roadmap, strategic R&D investments

- 99% neural accuracy maintained
- Production deployment initiated (5%+ traffic)
- DWCP v4 alpha released
- 5+ regions operational
- 100+ certified developers
- 10-year roadmap published

title: Add missing struct fields in backend
description:
